New Records: Bam Adebayo did not make a single field goal out of six attempts, which is the first time in his career with at least 25 minutes played.
Miami Heat was out-rebounded by a large margin, 57-32, which is the sixth time in team history that another team had at least 25 boards more.
Key Match Events: Tyler Herro finished the game with 15 points on four of 12 shooting from the field, including only connecting on one from beyond the arc out of eight attempts.
Miami Heat lost by 36 points to the Utah Jazz.
Pre-Game Insights: Erik Spoelstra addressed before the game how the focus is on the season in front of them.
Post-Match Reflections: Tyler Herro spoke about putting the Jimmy Butler situation past the team and focusing on the players in the locker room.
Erik Spoelstra downplayed the situation with Butler as having any impact on the team and emphasized not making any excuses for the loss.
